entry.title: WIND WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 6:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.0°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 60 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Showers. Temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
